mapper.select: SELECT W_CHAT_MESSAGE.sender_no as sender, W_CHAT_MESSAGE.content as content, W_CHAT_MESSAGE.created_at as time FROM W_CHAT_ROOM JOIN W_CHAT_MESSAGE ON W_CHAT_ROOM.seq = W_CHAT_MESSAGE.chat_room_no WHERE (W_CHAT_ROOM.sender_no = #{sender_no} AND W_CHAT_ROOM.receiver_no = #{receiver_no}) OR (W_CHAT_ROOM.sender_no = #{receiver_no} AND W_CHAT_ROOM.receiver_no = #{sender_no}) ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT chat.sender_no AS sender_no, chat.receiver_no AS receiver_no, user.id AS uid FROM W_CHAT_ROOM AS chat JOIN M_USER AS user ON user.seq = chat.sender_no OR user.seq = chat.receiver_no WHERE chat.sender_no = #{user_no} OR chat.receiver_no = #{user_no};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO W_CHAT_MESSAGE ( chat_room_no, sender_no, content, created_at, ) VALUES ( #{chat_room_no}, #{sender_no}, #{content}, str_to_date(#{created_at}, "%Y%m%d%H%i%S"), )
INSERT INTO W_CHAT_ROOM ( sender_no, receiver_no, ) VALUES ( #{sender_no}, #{receiver_no}, )
mapper.update: UPDATE W_WILLOW SET state = 'Y', WHERE (sender_no = #{sender_no} AND receiver_no = #{receiver_no}) OR (sender_no = #{receiver_no} AND receiver_no = #{sender_no})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM W_WILLOW WHERE sender_no = #{sender_no} AND receiver_no = #{receiver_no};
